    public class Playlist
extends Aggrupation
implements java.io.Serializable
    Class of Playlist that inherit from Aggrupation and that defines object of music type Playlist.

      This method returns the length of the song that is in the index position given by the integer received by argument.

      Returns whether a playlist is a playlist or not

      void removeSong​(Song s)
      This method deletes the song 's' received by argument from the list of songs that compose the playlist.
